title: A lesson in compassion
subtitle: Was the actor a beggar disguised to be used to test the amateur sympathy of students?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The students of the religious institute enrolled in a chapter on Jesus'life arrive in their classroom to pass the final exam and find notice that the test will be conducted in another building on the other side of the campus. While students across campus rush into the new room, each of them is accepted by the beggar who seeks their help. But none of the students stops for him, and they're all rushing and eager to get on time for the exam.
